title: Visit Wales
content:
Anyone know [this sans serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201161711/http:/www.visitwales.co.uk/) please?

 [‹ Almost-famiiar handwriting script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201161711/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49461 "Go to previous forum topic") [Iso50 Artisan Gallery Type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201161711/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49493 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nick Job

comments.content:
You’re on fire, Stephen. Thank you.

I love Ministry, because I love British street furniture.

I love anything by Jock Kinneir and Margaret Calvert too. I am thinking of doing a website devoted to Rail Alphabet (and possibly the British Rail corporate identity). It’s a bit self indulgent but I don’t care. It’s a masterpiece.
